overview:
Mark Camp

Registered Representative

Phone: 352-369-9726 Fax: 352-351-1687 Mobile Phone: 352-362-1573 E-mail: mark.camp@mmcfinancial.com

Mark Camp, Registered Representative is a lifelong resident of Ocala, FL. He received his Bachelor’s degree from Valdosta State University. After graduation Mark was employed as a Vice President and Chief Financial Officer for three multi-million dollar corporations in the Ocala area for over 22 years. He opened MMC Financial Services (previously known as Mark Camp Financial Services) in 1998. He is a Past President of the Ocala Kiwanis Club, Elder and Chairman of the Board of the First Christian Church.
